analysis.description:
Ownable.newOwner (/unique_chucks/13/0x40fdb6653bf98333b2c8ffa7c3625e7cc83668be.sol#90) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- acceptOwnership (/unique_chucks/13/0x40fdb6653bf98333b2c8ffa7c3625e7cc83668be.sol#116-123)

FIX.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0x40fdb6653bf98333b2c8ffa7c3625e7cc83668be.sol#207-208)
FixToken.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0x40fdb6653bf98333b2c8ffa7c3625e7cc83668be.sol#19-21)
Ownable.newOwner should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0x40fdb6653bf98333b2c8ffa7c3625e7cc83668be.sol#90)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/13/0x40fdb6653bf98333b2c8ffa7c3625e7cc83668be.sol:
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/13/0x40fdb6653bf98333b2c8ffa7c3625e7cc83668be.sol:
